Dear Mohamed,

 

Greetings from the Marina Mall Management Team!

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Dear Mohamed,

 

Greetings from the Marina Mall Management Team!

 

As of today, please be informed that the below-mentioned document(s) has expired from our records. These document(s) are crucial for our operations. Kindly submit (if already renewed):

 

SN

Document Name

Expiry Date

1

Abu Dhabi Commercial License

21/Sep/2024

2

Abu Dhabi Civil Defense Certificate

11/Sep/2024

3

Comprehensive General Liability Insurance

23/Sep/2024

 

Your role in maintaining the smooth operations of our mall is crucial and greatly appreciated.

 

 

Kind Regards, 





 

Nelmerson Del Rosario

Compliance Officer

T : +971 2 6818300 Ext. 616

 

Al Marina, Abu Dhabi

United Arab Emirates

P.O. Box: 42681
